title: Night Light constantly enabling/disabling when device on Pixel Stand.
content:
After the Android 10 update I've noticed when placing my Pixel 3 XL on the Pixel Stand to charge at night the Night Light mode switches on/off randomly every few seconds/minutes.  When this happens the ambient display also switches off for a split second.

I have Night Light mode set to automatically enable at sunset and disable at sunrise.  Also the device is centered on the stand and charges with no issue.
